hp1: Swipe to the right to reveal the left menu.
hp2: (On desktop click and drag from left to right)
eQuery_01:
List of Company that have queried document under
Section 11(8) & (9) of the Companies Act 1965.
eQuery_02:
1. Please enter "944751" for company/MyCoID number 944751-A in the field above.

2. Any inquiries regarding queried document will be not entertained over the phone. Please go to the nearest SSM office for further information.

3. SSM shall not be held liable and responsible for any misuse of the information by irresponsible person.
eCompound_02:
1. The information displayed may take time to be updated. As such please keep the payment receipt as proof of payment.

2. SSM shall not be held liable and responsible for any misuse of the information by irresponsible person.

3. Please contact the nearest SSM office for a copy of the compound notice.

4. For the purpose of validation and verification on the information displayed, please contact 03-22995334 or email ar_compliance@ssm.com.my.
s308_01:
Status of Application to Strike-off a Company
under S308 of Companies ACT 1965 / under S550 of Companies Act 2016

ERRORCAMERAPERMISSION: MySSM Scan QR code require access to CAMERA. Please enabled camera permission.
QRCODEGUIDE:
1. Tap BizTrust logo above to start scanning QR Code

2. Point the scanner window to the BizTrust QR Code

3. Upon successful scanning, user will be presented with the result.
NAME: Name
CHECKCONNECTION: Check your internet connection and try again
PLEASECONTACTENQUIRY: Please contact <font color='#FF5733'>enquiry@ssm.com.my</font> for further clarification.
BIZTRUSTINTROCONTENT: SSM BizTrust is a business starter kit that serves as digital identification of business entities registered with the Companies Commission of Malaysia (SSM).
BIZTRUSTOBJCONTENT: The objective of SSM BizTrust business starter kit is to strengthen the compliance with business entities through the provisions of the Acts administered by SSM with validation through SSM BizTrust QR code.
BIZTRUSTFUNCCONTENT: This method of reviewing merchant information via SSM BizTrust QR code will display information such as name of business, business entities registration number, status and URL.
QRSCANPROMPT: Place QR code inside the scan area
CHECKSSMBIZTRUST: Check SSM BizTrust information through MySSM application.
